name: Bob the Bug Hunter
description:
Game created for Blackthornprod game jam!

In order to stop the bugs, You must write code!
Use commands like:
- Move(left)
-Shoot(right)
-Jump(up)
And many, many more!

Enjoy!

Game created by:
Devmack (https://github.com/Devmack)
WojTechM (https://github.com/WojTechM)
